Early Days of Ethereum

Articles and videos detailing the early days of the Ethereum project

  • Home
  • Articles
  • People
  • Videos
  • GitHub

This is an ongoing project documenting the early days of the Ethereum project. All contributions towards this public record are very welcome, via issues, pull requests or via Bob's X account.

Back Story

This is a continuation of a 2017/2018 project in which Bob Summerwill gathered information on the early contributors to the Ethereum project and of people who were involved with the Ethereum Foundation in its early years:

  • Ethereum Foundation People - released 31st March 2018
  • Ethereum Foundation Timeline - released 4th May 2018

Since the original information was first published, three books have been written on the history of Ethereum, which give a fuller story:

  • Out of The Ether by Matthew Leising
  • The Infinite Machine by Camila Russo
  • The Cryptopians by Laura Shin

Contributions welcome via issues and pull requests.
